content.prompt: Helen Frankenthaler used diluted paint primarily to

choices.label: create the illusion of distance and depth in her work
demonstrate the spontaneous flowing of paint across a surface
form hard-edged geometric compositions using tonal variants
reveal the expressive power of vigorous brushwork

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
